pages.text: Cooperoceras is a nautiloid from the Late Permian period. They had a spiralled shell with curved hollow spines along the spiral. They were quite small, their shells measuring to less than half a meter in diameter.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Egg
